post:
Hey Guys!  

It's been a while, I've decided it's time to post an offer!
  
If you know me, you probably remember my dirt-cheap NAT VPS servers, which are pretty great. But do you know what's even better? I do! A dirt-cheap dedicated IPv4 VPS!  I call them, LittleVZ's. Well, What are you waiting for! Take a look at the offer!  I also threw in my classic NAT Deal's :)
  
As always, if you have any questions please ask! I am here to help.  
  
LVZ-256MB  
256MB RAM  
5GB Disk Space  
250GB Bandwidth  
1 vCPU Core  
1 IPv4 Address  
/80 block IPv6 Address   
500Mbps - UK, Virginia, Singapore  
NO SUPPORT  
OpenVZ 7/SolusVM Control Panel  
No promo code needed  
[​$8/year in UK, Virginia, Singapore (SGP SOLD OUT)](https://hosting.gullo.me/order/config/index/little-vz/?group_id=32&pricing_id=322&coupon=LVZ-256MB-4)

Standard pricing can be found,  
[Here  ](https://hosting.gullo.me/pricing)  

I am offering these servers myself and not as a company. If you have any questions or need support at any time it will always be me answering you, Because of this the whole support process will be more streamlined as you will only be talking with me. It is my goal to keep all users satisfied by any means and I will strive to do so.

Looking for something else? I can accommodate a wide range of applications. Send me a support ticket so I can set you up with custom VPS offers!
